reviewText: I purchased for my Dad and he loves it.  I'm glad it's on DVD rather than the usual VHS option.  It's a combination of former Christmas shows and having the old gang introduce segments of those old shows.  It's nicely done and although there is nothing like watching the original shows, we enjoyed this DVD as a Christmas Reunion.
I loved it!  It was great to hear all the old Christmas songs and Hymns that are seldom on Christmas shows today.  I would recommend it to any Welk fans.
Gift for my 92 year old mother... she loves the music!
Everything Welk and Christmas is perfect.
My mother-in-law is 90, and was thrilled when I got her this DVD.
Purchased as a gift for a nonagenarian. She was very pleased with it.
My mom loves this she is 96 and she has a great big smile when she watches this
Since my Mom is part of the greatest generation, she is enjoying the dvd
